name: Quarterback SNAP
summary: Strap your helmet on and step into the life-like practice facility of Quarterback Snap, an exhilarating football passing game for HTC Vive. Test your skills as a quarterback in training by racing against the clock to land as many passes as you can in the hands of your receivers. Extra points for speed and accuracy, so if you want a place at the top of our global leaderboard, you better bring the heat!
